title: Nav2: Path Planning for Bipedal Humanoid Movement
description: Welcome to the Nav2 section of the AI-Robot Brain curriculum. This module focuses on implementing path planning algorithms specifically tailored for bipedal humanoid movement using Nav2 to enable robots to navigate complex environments with human-like locomotion.
